products.title: Splash Chilli Red Panel Blind
products.metadescription: Splash Chilli Red Panel Blind in Red. Made to measure from £36.61 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Panel Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Our moisture-resistant Splash Chilli Red panel blinds have a stylish and modern feel that will update any space.  The medium red panel is a beautiful, contemporary colour which will brighten, and enrich the space with its warm, saturated shade. 
 
As panel blinds reach a massive 5 metres width and 3,.5 metres drop, this makes it one of the largest blinds we make.  A popular blind for large windows and doors, or as a modern room-divider, this blind is not only durable but versatile by design. 
 
Panel blinds add a really modern feel to any space and at Swift Direct Blinds, when purchasing this blind you will also be able to take advantage of our free 5 year guarantee, which means investing in a piece that will stand the test of time.  
 
 Product ID: DB-PAN0271 Fabric Colour: Chilli Red Material: 100% Polyester Headrail: White Aluminium 5 channel track     Control Type: Cord or Wand Energy Saving Rating: ER2 - Medium Energy Saving Value - Effective Thermal Retention Light Filtering: Yes

products.title: Splash Ruby Red Panel Blind
products.metadescription: Splash Ruby Red Panel Blind in Red. Made to measure from £36.61 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Panel Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Splash Ruby Red Panel blinds are a fabulous way to dress your window.  The saturated red, moisture-resistant fabric is a contemporary and stylish colour choice for any living space.  Panel blinds are perfect for patio doors & are available with various control & stacking options, including a wand control making them inherently child safe.  As they are a made to measure product, they are covered with our 5 year guarantee giving you that extra peace of mind when purchasing.  
 
 Product ID: DB-PAN0261 Fabric Colour: Ruby Red Material: 100% Polyester Headrail: White Aluminium 5 channel track     Control Type: Cord or Wand Light Filtering: Yes

products.title: Bella Blackout Scarlet Red Panel Blind
products.metadescription: Bella Blackout Scarlet Red Panel Blind in Red. Made to measure from £42.92 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Panel Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Our best-selling Bella Blackout range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish and colour-match blackout backing, perfect for adding style inside and inside your home! 
 
This bold, scarlet red panel blind brightens any room and is also made from blackout fabric, to help blackout the light when desired, making this quality made to measure panel blind a perfect addition to room that needs optimum light control.  Our panels are great for privacy and light control, especially for large spaces - reaching up to 5 metres width and 3 metres drop! 
 
At Swift Direct Blinds, we take quality seriously.  Not only are we situated in the heart of the Yorkshire textile industry, but our own company is also seeped with a rich history, with over 50 years experience making blinds and curtains for home up and down the country.  This red panel blind not only comes with a fabulous 5 year guarantee, for extra peace of mind, but is made by our blind specialists and comes with caring customer-first service.
 
 Product ID: DB-PAN0217 Fabric Colour: Scarlet Red Material: 100% Polyester Lining: Colour Match Backing - See Sample Headrail: White Aluminium     Control Type: Cord or Wand Energy Saving Rating: ER3 - Highest Energy Saving Value - UV Protection and Effective Thermal Retention Blackout: Yes

products.title: Bella Blackout Ruby Red Panel Blind
products.metadescription: Bella Blackout Ruby Red Panel Blind in Red. Made to measure from £42.92 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Panel Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Simple, bold and cohesive, our Ruby Red Bella Blackout panel blind blends minimal style with practical design.  A firm favourite, our Bella Blackout fabrics come in a wide array of colours and blind types to suit any room - Whether its blackout panel blinds in the bedroom,  in the kitchen or study, these blackout fabrics are durable and value for money.  
 
Panel blinds are great being used to create sections in large spaces, as they can be top fixed to ceilings and can span up to a massive 5 metres width and 3 metres drop! 
 
At Swift Direct Blind, quality comes first.  Our panel blinds are expertly cut and assembled by our panel blinds team, with over 50 years of making blinds and curtains, not only do our blinds come with a quality finish, we provide a free five year guarantee on this product.
 
 Product ID: DB-PAN0245 Fabric Colour: Ruby Red Material: 100% Polyester Lining: Colour Match Backing - See Sample Headrail: White Aluminium 5 channel track     Control Type: Cord or Wand Energy Saving Rating: ER3 - Highest Energy Saving Value - UV Protection and Effective Thermal Retention Blackout: Yes
